data.title: Maya the Bee
data.meta_description: Based on the books written by Waldemar Bonsels and following on from the movie of the same name, Maya is the story of a little bee that goes her own wâ¦
data.text:
EPISODE 1

The Birth of Maya

Maya's birth, her discovery of the hive's life, its organization and her friendship with Willy and Flip.

11 min Â· Mar 29, 2013 G

EPISODE 2

The Take Off

Maya sneaks out of the hive at night for the first time.

11 min Â· Mar 29, 2013 G

EPISODE 3

The Queen's Messenger

With the official Queen messenger being absent, Miss Cassandra organises a contest to select the new junior messenger. Maya, Willy, Lara, Max and Shelby will compete against each other during a wild race through the meadow.

11 min Â· Mar 29, 2013 G

EPISODE 6

Keep the Ball Rolling

A fly has stolen Ben's ball to use it as a nest to lay her eggs. Unfortunately, it's the ball Ben wanted to show at the big dungbeetle meeting ! Maya and Willy decide to help Ben to make a new ball dedicated to the fly only.

11 min Â· Apr 2, 2013 G
